question_1.question: What is the main benefit of upgrading to the Premium tier according to the text provided?
question_1.explanation: The text states that upgrading to Premium provides 'unlimited everything,' which is the main benefit over the Free tier.

question_2.question: Who is the author of the article titled 'Upgrade from Free to Premium _ Community'?
question_2.explanation: The author of the article is explicitly mentioned as Thomas Hjermitslev.
